name: "Astral Harmony" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Our Music" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Music》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Music》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm not going to play more just because you praise me, okay~?

name: "Summerly Tone♪" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's draw phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, you may put this card into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Well, the world can't help but pay attention to someone like me~!

name: "Astral Harmony" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Morfonica》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards in their waiting room except that card to their deck, and shuffles their deck.
flavorText: The time's finally come for me and my guitar to shine~!

name: "Summerly Tone♪" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your hand, put it on any position of your stage, and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(4)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal the same damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Yeah~. Now that was fun~. That was pretty good for our first concert, don't you think?

name: "Daylight" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【CONT】 If you have 1 or less other characters, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open left position of your center stage. （You can only move it to the leftmost position)

name: "Morfonica" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Daylight" Toko Kirigaya" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. (This ability does not activate if this card is not in the stage at the beginning of the climax phase) 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose 1 level X or lower 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of those cards. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: "Daylight" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Music》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Morfonica" Toko Kirigaya" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. (This ability does not activate if this card is not in the stage at the beginning of the climax phase)

name: "On Guitar" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: "Morfonica" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【CONT】 This card gets -2 level while in the stage. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Music》 characters, this card gets +1500 power, and the character facing this card gets the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Music》 characters, you may choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: Our Music
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" LAYER
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play event cards from their hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Beautiful Birthday" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent, look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of their deck. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: RAS is precious to me, too.

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" LOCK
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may return this card to your hand.
flavorText: There's nobody stronger than the five of us.

name: "Rausch und/and Craziness Ⅱ" MASKING
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Pushing for Her Dream" is in your climax area, choose 1 of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavorText: But until I joined RAS, I'd never had a place where I could do that.

name: "THE DEPTHS" LOCK
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Music》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 [【REST】 this card] When you use "Accelerate", if this card is 【STAND】, you may pay the cost. If you do, you may choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: I'm glad you chose the five of us to become a band.

name: "THE DEPTHS" LAYER
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent puts all of their stock into their waiting room, and puts the same number of cards from the top of their deck into their stock.
flavorText: From now on, let's try getting to know more about one another and focus on getting strong together.

name: "THE DEPTHS" MASKING
text: 【AUTO】 During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, at the beginning of the encore step, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Accelerate [Put 1 《Music》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your waiting room, return all cards except that card in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Like a charm!

name: MV Filming, LOCK
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all of your other level 0 or lower characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of other 《Music》 characters you have.
flavorText: Bang!

name: "The Music Doesn't Lie" MASKING
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, all of your characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax with [[treasure.gif]] in its trigger icon, you may draw 1 card. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."
flavorText: Brought you a present.

name: "Straight Through Our Dreams!" LAYER
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position of the stage." 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into their waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Chasing Her Dream, LOCK
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Poppin'Party》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character, choose 1 of your other 《Poppin'Party》 or 《RAISE A SUILEN》 characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Stage of the Finals, MASKING
text: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hands. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: It's time to duke it out over advancin' to the finals, eh?

name: Greatest Live, LAYER
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 When this card's trigger check reveals a climax with [[treasure.gif]] in its trigger icon, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: To a New Stage, LOCK
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2500 power for each character in your opponent's back stage. 【AUTO】 Encore [(1) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Huh?

name: Beautiful Birthday
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Pushing for Her Dream
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

text: 【ACT】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 《Music》 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

(Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Music》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. （Battle does not take place）
flavorText: Umm... I'll do my best to make it a good song.

flavorText: But if our guitarist can't even impress me with their skills, we'll never beat Roselia to a pulp.

name: "Summerly Tone♪" Mashiro Kurata

If you do, move this card to an open position of your back stage.

For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 《RAISE A SUILEN》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

flavorText: I don't need an honor student. Even you must be getting tired of that schtick, right?

name: "Astral Harmony" Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character revealed among those cards, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: ... I'm interested to see what happens when you prioritize your emotions.

If you do, choose 1 ""Daylight" Rui Yashio" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on. (This ability does not activate if this card is not on the stage at the beginning of the climax phase)

Reveal the top card of your deck, and if that card is a character of the level that your opponent declared, put it on any position of your stage. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: "Trusted Class President" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of your characters are 《Music》, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: Tsukushi: "Fufu, of course!"

name: "Normalcy Comes First" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards or "Backup" from your hand.
flavorText: If I had to pick a word to describe myself, it would be, uhm... Normal! I'm just a regular high school student!

name: "Popular Girl" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if you have a 《Music》 character, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'm the star of Tsukinomori, and don't you forget it!

name: "Behold My Masterpiece!" Nanami Hiromachi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Toko: "Maybe I'm just that charismatic."

name: "Special Announcement!" Toko Kirigaya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText:
But you know, it's different when
you give a killer performance at a concert.
It's super fun for us, and the crowd gets totally fired up, too!

name: Behold My Masterpiece!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: I probably just have good taste!

name: "Trusted Class President" Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【CONT】 All of your other ""Trusted Class President" Toko Kirigaya" and ""Trusted Class President" Mashiro Kurata" get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/""Trusted Class President" Toko Kirigaya" ""Trusted Class President" Mashiro Kurata" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Trusted Class President" Toko Kirigaya" or ""Trusted Class President" Mashiro Kurata" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Fufu... I am the class president, after all!

name: "Gaining Recognition" Rui Yashio
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 0 or lower characters in front of this card get +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: If our goal is to introduce our band, I do not believe we should be making videos. Having people listen to our music would be far more effective.

name: "Fufu, Leave It to Me!" Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Morfonica is still a new band, but I hope we'll be able to shine as brightly as Tsukinomori students should.

name: "Rejected Path" Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: ... You are free to think whatever you wish.

name: "Full of Confidence" Tsukushi Futaba
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if your hand has 4 or more cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Fufu, did you see how confident and leader-like I was?

name: "Pessimistic Girl" Mashiro Kurata
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Shine Once More" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Music》 character, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: I'll do my best, so I look forward to your support...!

name: "Trusted Class President" Mashiro Kurata
flavorText: Tsukushi: "Darn it! I wasn't any help again!"

name: "Forsaking Talent" Rui Yashio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Music》 characters among those cards ×3000.
flavorText: I have always aimed for first place, and I intend to keep getting first place.

name: "Forsaking Talent" Mashiro Kurata
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play event cards or "Backup" from your hand." 【AUTO】 Change [Put this card into your waiting room] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Blue Sky Full of Stars" Mashiro Kurata" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: I can't imagine you ever getting a failing grade, Yashio-san. I heard you've always been ranked first in our grade ever since middle school...

name: "Blue Sky Full of Stars" Mashiro Kurata
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the bottom 3 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in your center stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: But I can keep trying no matter the hardships or challenges because everyone's there...

name: Normal Camouflage
text: Choose 1 level X or lower 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of ""Pessimistic Girl" Mashiro Kurata" in your waiting room.
flavorText: Nanami: "Okay, I'll give it a shot~"

name: Shine Once More
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Mashiro: "Until recently, I would've never dreamed of joining a band."

name: Morfonica
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character with in its trigger icon in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
